Grundrick’s Venture (Age of Sigmar) [1,000pts]

  • **Pitched Battle** 1,000 (Order - Kharadron Overlords) [1,000pts]

    Rules: At the Double, Forward to Victory, Inspiring Presence

    • Leader [240pts]

      • Aetheric Navigator [100pts]

        Selections: Ranging Pistol, Zephyrscope

        Categories: AETHERIC NAVIGATOR, DUARDIN, HERO, SKYFARER, KHARADRON OVERLORDS, ORDER, Leader, MARINE

        Unit: Aetheric Navigator, Unit Abilities: Aethersight, Aetherstorm, Read the Winds, Weapon: Ranging Pistol, Zephyrscope


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Aetheric Navigator 4"573+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Aethersight An Aetheric Navigator can attempt to dispel 1 endless spell at the start of your hero phase and attempt to unbind 1 spell in the enemy hero phase, in the same manner as a WIZARD.
        Aetherstorm In your hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 36" of this model that is visible to them and can fly, and roll a dice. On a 1-2 nothing happen. On a 3-5 halve the Move characteristic of that unit until your next hero phase, and that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Read the Winds You can re-roll run and charge rolls for friendly SKYVESSELS that are visible to a friendly AETHERIC NAVIGATOR that has not attempted to use the Aetherstorm ability in the same turn.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Ranging Pistol Missile15"23+3+-11
        Zephyrscope Melee1"23+4+-1

      • Arkanaut Admiral [140pts]

        Selections: 0. Master Commander, 1. Staff of Ocular Optimization, General, Skalfhammer, Volley Pistol

        Categories: ARKANAUT ADMIRAL, DUARDIN, HERO, SKYFARER, KHARADRON OVERLORDS, ORDER, Leader, MARINE, General

        Artefact: Staff of Ocular Optimization, Command Abilities: Master of the Skies, On My Mark, Fire!, Repel Boarders!, Up And At Them!, Command Trait: Master Commander, Unit: Arkanaut Admiral, Unit Abilities: If You Want A Job Done…, Protect the Admiral!, Weapon: Skalfhammer, Volley Pistol


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Staff of Ocular Optimization Pick 1 of the bearer's missile weapons. Add 1 to the hit rolls for attacks made by that weapon.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Master of the Skies You can use this command ability at the start of your shooting phase. If you do, pick 1 friendly SKYVESSEL that has a model with this command ability in its garrison. That SKYVESSEL can shoot in that phase even if it ran earlier in the same turn.
        On My Mark, Fire! You can use this command ability at the start of your shooting phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly SKYVESSEL that has a model with this command ability in its garrison. You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by that SKYVESSEL in that phase.
        Repel Boarders! You can use this command ability at the start of your combat phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly SKYVESSEL that has a model with this command ability in its garrison. Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by that SKYVESSEL and any models in its garrison in that phase.
        Up And At Them! You can use this command ability at the start of your charge phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly SKYFARERS unit that is wholly within 12" of a friendly model with this command ability. You can re-roll charge rolls for that unit in that phase.
        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        Master Commander If this general is part of your army and on the battlefield, each time you spend a command point to use a command ability on this general warscroll, roll a dice. On a 5+, you receive 1 extra command point.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Arkanaut Admiral 4"683+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        If You Want A Job Done… You can re-roll hit and wound rolls of 1 for attacks made with a melee weapon by this model that target a HERO or MONSTER.
        Protect the Admiral! Do not take battleshock tests for friendly KHARADRON OVERLORDS units while they are wholly within 12" of this model.

        In addition, roll a dice before you allocate a wound or mortal wound to a friendly ARKANAUT ADMIRAL while it is within 3" of any friendly SKYFARER units with 5 or more models. On a 5+, you must allocate that wound or mortal wound to a friendly SKYFARERS unit with 5 or more models that is within 3" of that ARKANAUT ADMIRAL, instead of to that ARKANAUT ADMIRAL.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Skalfhammer Melee1"33+2+-22
        Volley Pistol Missile9"33+4+-11

    • Battleline [340pts]

      • Arkanaut Company [90pts]

        Selections: 10 Arkanaut Company [90pts], Aetherflare Pistol, Aethermatic Volley Gun & Gun Butt, Light Skyhook, 7x Privateer Pistol and Arkanaut Cutter, Skypike

        Categories: ARKANAUT COMPANY, DUARDIN, SKYFARER, KHARADRON OVERLORDS, ORDER, Battleline, MARINE, Other

        Unit: Arkanaut Company, Unit Abilities: Company Captain, Glory-seekers, Weapon: Aetherflare Pistol, Aethermatic Volley Gun (Arkanauts), Arkanaut Cutter, Arkanaut Cutter (Company Captain), Gun Butt, Light Skyhook, Privateer Pistol, Skypike


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Arkanaut Company 4"164+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Company Captain One model in this unit can be a Company Captain. That model is armed with an Aetherflare Pistol or Volley Pistol instead of a Privateer Pistol.
        Glory-seekers You can re-roll battleshock tests for this unit while it is wholly within 9" of an objective, and add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by this unit while it is wholly within 9" of an objective. This ability cannot be used if this unit is part of a garrison.

      • Arkanaut Frigate [250pts]

        Selections: 3. Malefic Skymines, Aethershot Carbines, Boarding Weapons, Heavy Sky Cannon, Wound Track

        Categories: ARKANAUT FRIGATE, DUARDIN, SKYVESSEL, WAR MACHINE, KHARADRON OVERLORDS, ORDER, Behemoth, Battleline

        Artefact: Malefic Skymines, Skyvessel Wound Track: 00-03, 04-06, 07-09, 10-12, 13+, Unit: Arkanaut Frigate, Unit Abilities: Aetheric Navigator and Endrinrigger, Bomb Racks, Disengage, Fly High, Flying Transport (Frigate), Heavy Sky Cannon, Weapon: Aethershot Carbines, Boarding Weapons, Heavy Sky Cannon: Shell, Heavy Sky Cannon: Shrapnel


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Malefic Skymines Once per battle, at the start of the combat phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit that can fly and is within 6" of this model and roll a dice. On a 2-3, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. On a 4+, that enemy unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.
        Skyvessel Wound Track MoveBoarding WeaponsBomb Racks Ref
        00-03 12", Disengage, Fly High6+1
        04-06 10", Disengage, Fly High50
        07-09 8", Disengage40
        10-12 6"3-1
        13+ 4"2-1
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Arkanaut Frigate *1484+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Aetheric Navigator and Endrinrigger In your hero phase, you can heal 1 wound allocated to this model. In addition, you can re‑roll run rolls for this model.
        Bomb Racks At the start of the combat phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of this model and roll a dice. Add the Bomb Rack modifier from this model’s damage table to the roll. On a 4+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Disengage This model and any models in its garrison can still shoot if this model retreats in the same turn, as long as there are no enemy units that can fly within 3" of this model at the start of the retreat move and there are less than 10 wounds allocated to this model at the start of the retreat move.
        Fly High Instead of making a normal move with this model, if there are less than 7 wounds currently allocated to this model, you can say that it will fly high (it can retreat and disengage). If you do so, remove this model from the battlefield and set it up again more than 1" from any terrain features or objectives and more than 9" from any enemy models.
        Flying Transport (Frigate) This model can fly, and can be garrisoned by up to 15 friendly MARINE models even though it is not a terrain feature.

        Halve this model’s Move characteristic and it cannot Fly High if there are 11 or more models in its garrison. Units cannot join or leave this model’s garrison if it has made a move or flown high in the same phase (they can join or leave before it does so). Models in the garrison are not counted towards gaining control of an objective.

        An attack made by a weapon that is in range of this model can target either this model or a unit in its garrison. If this model is destroyed, before it is removed from play, roll 1 dice for each model in its garrison. On a 1, that model is slain. Set up any surviving models wholly within 3" of this model and more than 3" from any enemy units.
        Heavy Sky Cannon Before attacking with a Heavy Sky Cannon, choose either the Shrapnel or Shell missile weapon characteristics for that shooting attack.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Aethershot Carbines Missile12"43+3+-12
        Boarding Weapons Melee1"*4+4+-1
        Heavy Sky Cannon: Shell Missile30"13+2+-2D6
        Heavy Sky Cannon: Shrapnel Missile24"D63+3+-12

    • Other [370pts]

      • Grundstok Gunhauler [150pts]

        Selections: 3. Coalbeard's Collapsible Compartments, Aethershot Carbine, Boarding Weapons, Sky Cannon

        Categories: DUARDIN, GRUNDSTOK GUNHAULER, SKYVESSEL, WAR MACHINE, KHARADRON OVERLORDS, ORDER, Other, Artillery

        Artefact: Coalbeard's Collapsible Compartments, Unit: Grundstok Gunhauler, Unit Abilities: Ahead Full, Bomb Racks, Disengage, Escort Vessel, Fly, Fly High, Sky Cannon, Weapon: Aethershot Carbine, Boarding Weapons, Sky Cannon: Shell, Sky Cannon: Shrapnel


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Coalbeard's Collapsible Compartments This model can use the Flying Transport ability from the Arkanaut Ironclad warscroll. If it does so, the maximum number of models that can garrison it is 5 instead of 25, and it can always fly high and/ or disengage no matter how many models are in its garrison.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Grundstok Gunhauler 12"1074+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Ahead Full Once per battle, at the start of your movement phase, you can say that this model will move ahead full. If you do so, add 6" to the Move characteristic of this model in that phase.
        Bomb Racks At the start of the combat phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of this model and roll a dice. Add the Bomb Rack modifier from this model’s damage table to the roll. On a 4+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Disengage This model and any models in its garrison can still shoot if this model retreats in the same turn, as long as there are no enemy units that can fly within 3" of this model at the start of the retreat move and there are less than 10 wounds allocated to this model at the start of the retreat move.
        Escort Vessel Roll 1 dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to a friendly SKYVESSEL other than a Grundstok Gunhauler while it is within 3" of any friendly Grundstok Gunhaulers. On a 6, that wound or mortal wound is negated.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Fly High Instead of making a normal move with this model, if there are less than 7 wounds currently allocated to this model, you can say that it will fly high (it can retreat and disengage). If you do so, remove this model from the battlefield and set it up again more than 1" from any terrain features or objectives and more than 9" from any enemy models.
        Sky Cannon Before attacking with a Sky Cannon, choose either the Shrapnel or Shell missile weapon characteristics for that shooting attack.

      • Grundstok Thunderers [120pts]

        Selections: 5 Grundstok Thunderers [120pts], Aethercannon, Aetheric Fumigator, Aethershot Rifle, Decksweeper, Grundstok Mortar, Gun Butt, Gunnery Sergeant, Honour Bearer

        Categories: DUARDIN, GRUNDSTOK THUNDERERS, SKYFARER, KHARADRON OVERLORDS, ORDER, MARINE, Other

        Unit: Grundstok Thunderers, Unit Abilities: Choking Fug, Drive Them Back!, Gunnery Sergeant, Honour Bearer, Pin, Shred Them, Finish Them, Weapon: Aethercannon, Aetheric Fumigator, Aethershot Rifle, Decksweeper, Double-barreled Aethershot Rifle, Drillbill, Grundstok Mortar, Gun Butt


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Grundstok Thunderers 4"274+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Choking Fug Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by enemy models within 3" of any friendly models armed with an Aetheric Fumigator. This ability cannot be used by a model that is part of a garrison.
        Drive Them Back! Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of missile weapons used by this unit while any enemy units are within 3" of this unit. This ability cannot be used by a model that is part of a garrison.
        Gunnery Sergeant 1 model in this unit can be a Gunnery Sergeant. Replace that model's weapons with a Double-barreled Aethershot Rifle, Gun Butt and Drillbill.
        Honour Bearer 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be an Honour Bearer. You can reroll battleshock tests for a unit that includes any Honour Bearers.
        Pin, Shred Them, Finish Them Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with a Grundstok Mortar, Decksweeper or Aethercannon when it is used by a unit that has at least 1 of each of these weapons (i.e. at least 1 Grundstok Mortar, and at least 1 Decksweeper, and at least 1 Aethercannon). This ability cannot be used by a model that is part of a garrison.

      • Skywardens [100pts]

        Selections: 3 Skywardens [100pts], Aethermatic Volley Gun, Grapnel Launcher & Gun Butt, Vulcaniser Pistol and Skypike

        Categories: DUARDIN, SKYWARDENS, SKYFARER, KHARADRON OVERLORDS, ORDER, Other

        Unit: Skywardens, Unit Abilities: Custodian, Fly, Grapnel Launcher, Hitcher(s), Skymines, Timed Charges, Weapon: Aethermatic Volley Gun, Grapnel Launcher or Skyhook, Gun Butt, Skypike, Vulcaniser Pistol


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Skywardens 12"274+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Custodian 1 model in this unit can be a Custodian. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s melee weapons.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Grapnel Launcher Enemy units cannot retreat if they are within 3" of any models from this unit armed with a Grapnel Launcher.
        Hitcher(s) If this model is wholly within 6" of a friendly SKYVESSEL immediately before the SKYVESSL uses its Fly High ability, you can say that this model will hitch a lift instead of making a normal move (as long as this model has not already made a normal move in the same phase).

        If you do so, after that skyvessel has moved, remove this model from the battlefield and set it up again wholly within 6" of that SKYVESSEL, more than 1" from any terrain features or objectives and more than 9" from any enemy models.

        No more than 7 models can hitch a lift on the same SKYVESSEL in the same turn.
        Skymines If an enemy unit that can fly ends a charge move within 1" of any friendly units with this ability, you can roll 1 dice for each model in that enemy unit. For each 6, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Timed Charges Roll 1 dice for each enemy unit that is within 3" of this unit immediately before this unit makes a retreat move. On a 4+, the unit being rolled for suffers D3 mortal wounds.

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Kharadron Overlords

          Battle Trait: Aether-gold

          • 2) Barak-Zilfin, the Windswept City

            Selections: Amendment, Artycle, Footnote

            1) Artycle: Master the Skies, 2) Amendment: Don't Argue With the Wind, 3) Footnote: There's Always A Breeze If You Look For It, Battle Trait: Magnificent Skyvessels


        1) Artycle Details Ref
        Master the Skies You can re-roll hits rolls of 1 for attacks made by friendly SKYVESSELS that target a unit that can fly.
        2) Amendment Details Ref
        Don't Argue With the Wind In your movement phase, if you declare a friendly BARAK-ZILFIN unit will run, do not make a run roll. Instead, add 6" to the Move characteristic of all models in that unit for that phase.
        3) Footnote Details Ref
        There's Always A Breeze If You Look For It Once per battle, in your hero phase, 1 friendly BARAK-ZILFIN unit can make a normal move (it can run, retreat, or disengage.)
        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Aether-gold Each KHARADRON OVERLORDS HERO, SKYVESSEL, and KHARADRON OVERLORDS unit with 10 or more models starts a battle with 1 share of aether-gold.

        Once per phase, you can say that 1 unit from your army that has any shares of aether-gold will spend 1 of them. If you do so, subtract 1 rom that unit's Bravery characteristic for the rest of the battle, but you can pick a triumph it is eligible to use an immediately apply its effect to that unit. Ignore any restrictions on a triumph that say it can only be used once per battle if you pay to use it with a share of aether-gold.
        Magnificent Skyvessels You can choose 1 extra SKYVESSEL in your army to have a great endrinwork.

Force Rules

At the Double: You can use this command ability after you make a run roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, the run roll is treated as being a 6. (Core Rules p3)

Forward to Victory: You can use this command ability after you make a charge roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, re-roll the charge roll. (Core Rules p3)

Inspiring Presence: You can use this command ability at the start of the battleshock phase. If you do so, pick a friendly unit that is within 6" of friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. That unit does not have to take battleshock tests in that phase. (Core Rules p3)
